# Microsoft Technology Consulting Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Professional technology consulting website for a Microsoft specialist with 7 years of experience in:
- Advanced Analytics and AI
- Power Platform
- Intelligence Solutions
- Data Platform Engineering

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React 19
- Dark mode support
- SEO optimized

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow Microsoft branding guidelines (blues, professional palette)
- Responsive design (mobile-first)
- Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA)
- Professional animations (Framer Motion)
- SEO best practices

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js app router pages
- `/components` - Reusable React components
- `/lib` - Utilities and helpers
- `/public` - Static assets

## Key Features
- Services showcase (Analytics, AI, Power Platform, Data Platform)
- About/Experience section
- Contact form
- Blog capability
- Microsoft Partner preparation
- Dark/light mode toggle
